title: Epstein Scandal TURNS on Trump as Howard Lutnick Gets Caught LYING
summary:
Scott Galloway and Jessica Tarlov sit down with Yale leadership scholar Jeff Sonnenfeld to unpack his new book, Trump’s Ten Commandments. They dive into Trump’s racist stunts like posting the recent AI Obama video to his “tribal chieftain” style of centralizing power. Jeff breaks down how Trump bends rules, gets things done outside traditional channels, and uses distraction and propaganda to shift the public's focus. 

Prof G also talks with Prof Sonnenfeld about the Resist and Unsubscribe Movement, and what other things that business leaders can do right now to spark collective action.

For more on Scott's Resist and Unsubscribe movement: resistandunsubscribe.com

Follow Jessica Tarlov, @JessicaTarlov. 
Follow Prof G, @profgalloway.
Follow Raging Moderates, @RagingModeratesPod.
